name: CQ.Ext.EventObject
doc:
Just as CQ.Ext.Element wraps around a native DOM node, CQ.Ext.EventObject
wraps the browser's nat...

methods.name: getCharCode
methods.doc: Gets the character code for the event.

methods.name: getKey
methods.doc: Returns a normalized keyCode for the event.

methods.name: getPageX
methods.doc: Gets the x coordinate of the event.

methods.name: getPageY
methods.doc: Gets the y coordinate of the event.

methods.name: getTarget
methods.doc: Gets the target for the event.

methods.name: getWheelDelta
methods.doc: Normalizes mouse wheel delta across browsers

methods.name: getXY
methods.doc: Gets the page coordinates of the event.

methods.name: preventDefault
methods.doc: Prevents the browsers default handling of the event.

methods.name: within
methods.doc: Returns true if the target of this event is a child of el.  Unless the allowEl parameter is set, ...
